original: Bolling, Stig Rudolf Gustaf Sam, major, Borås, f. 15/7/97 i amiralitets-förs. i Karilistkronia av gen: maj or Sam B. o. Gerda Ulff. G. 27 m. Mayotte Ehrengranat. Barn: Carl-Erik f. 28, stud., Agneta 32, stud., Catharina 34, stud., Claes 39. — Avi. fältflygarprov 24, olika skjutsk. 30, 34 o. 36, tygoff:-kurs 35-36, takt. kurs f. reg:off. 43. Fänrik v. Älvsb. reg. 21, löjtn. 23, kapt. 36, major v. Älvsb. reg. sed. 42. Tjg. v. flygv. 24-30, lär. å stud :komp. v. L 17 31-32. Ordf. i Borås flygkl. Cere-monimäst. i frimurarlogen Astrea. Hobbies: jakt, frimärken, flygning. RSO, Idr:-, Skytte:-, Skidl:- m. fl. märken i guld.
translated: Bolling, Stig Rudolf Gustaf Sam, Major, Borås, born July 15th, 1897 in the naval district of Karilistkronia to General Major Sam B. and Gerda Ulff. Married Mayotte Ehrengranat in 1927. Children: Carl-Erik, born 1928 and studying, Agneta, born 1932 and studying, Catharina, born 1934 and studying, Claes, born 1939. Completed a field pilot examination in 1924, various shooting courses in 1930, 1934, and 1936, textile officer course from 1935-1936, tactical course for regimental officers in 1943. Appointed as Ensign in the Älvsborg regiment in 1921, Lieutenant in 1923, Captain in 1936, Major in the Älvsborg regiment in 1942. Served as a temporary pilot for the Air Force from 1924-1930 and as a teacher at the study company in L17 from 1931-1932. Chairman of the Borås flying club, ceremonial master in the Freemason's lodge Astrea. Hobbies include hunting, stamp collecting, and flying. Awarded with the Order of the Sword, Sports, Marksmanship, Skiing, and other gold medals.
